Uses of Class
net.kuujo.copycat.Resource

  • Packages that use Resource 
    Package Description
    net.kuujo.copycat
    Copycat is a cluster coordination framework built on a Raft distributed log.
    net.kuujo.copycat.atomic
    Provides distributed atomic variables such as AsyncReference.
    net.kuujo.copycat.collections
    Provides distributed collections such as AsyncMap and AsyncSet.
    net.kuujo.copycat.coordination
    Provides distributed coordination resources such as AsyncLock and AsyncLeaderElection and AsyncTopic for publish-subscribe messaging.

    • Uses of Resource in net.kuujo.copycat

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends Resource>
      CompletableFuture<T>      		 Node.create(Class<? super T> type)
      Creates a resource at this node.
      <T extends Resource>
      CompletableFuture<T>      		 Copycat.create(String path, Class<? super T> type)
      Creates a resource at the given path.
      <T extends Resource>
      CompletableFuture<T>      		 Node.get(Class<T> type)
      Gets a resource at this node.
